EClass

Class EClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • EClass.EClass

  • public abstract class EClass
extends java.lang.Object
    An EClass contains all of the major components needed for an electronic classroom session. These include a Presentation, Roster, Forum, and ApprovalTracker.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Audio audioStream
      Used to interact with presentation audio
      (package private) Forum forum
      Holds all information for an ongoing forum
      (package private) Presentation presentation
      Holds all presentation information for an EClass session
      (package private) Roster roster
      The class roster for the current presentation
      (package private) ApprovalTracker tracker
      Enables approval tracking operations and data collection
      (package private) Video videoStream
      Used to interact with presentation video
